meanings.sent1: The undrilled wood was smooth and untouched.
meanings.sent2: She bought the undrilled vase to paint herself.
meanings.sent3: The undrilled cookies were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: His undrilled mind was full of untapped potential.
meanings.sent5: The undrilled field stretched out before us, waiting to be explored.

meanings.definition: Not having holes drilled into it
meanings.sent1: The undrilled belt was plain and simple.
meanings.sent2: He preferred the undrilled leather for his project.
meanings.sent3: The undrilled bucket held water perfectly.
meanings.sent4: Her undrilled shoes were unique in design.
meanings.sent5: The undrilled wall remained untouched by construction.
